name: Find Bluetooth Devices
description: Do you often loose your bluetooth devices and have no idea where you have put them? This app will show the last connected GPS location.   What does it do?  Saves the GPS location whenever your bluetooth device gets connected/disconnected  Shows the map of the last connected location  Note: Free version will display ads  Permissions:  BLUETOOTH_ADMIN: Detect bluetooth connect/disconnect  BLUETOOTH: Detect bluetooth connect/disconnect  ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: Get GPS location  ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Get GPS location  INTERNET: Show Google Map  ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Show Google map  WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Cache Google map
